page.title: 07LOCAL EMPLOYERS
page.content: Cacti are sent all over the world from the Cacti Nursery in Sutton. This was opened 11 years ago by Mr Mottram who employs one local girl part-time to help him. The Chicken Farm managed by Mr Tim Kavanagh employs 7 people. Most of these employees live in Thirsk apart from Mrs Kavanagh. There are usually about 3000 chickens which are hatched out at the factory and kept there for a year,after which time they are taken to another factory 8 miles away where they are killed, frozen and sent to supermarkets. Mr Almack started making hand-made furniture 13 years ago. He now employs 7 men who live within a 10 mile radius of the village. He works mainly in oak and all the articles made have a small carved beaver on them.
